home.name_apresentation: HI, MY NAMES  IS ENDERSON LINHARES
home.who_i_am: I’m a front-end developer based in Fortaleza, Brasil. I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do.
home.what_i_do: Working with my hands to make magic happen on the internet. View my Projects, About Me, Resume, Contact Me or send me an email at endersonlinhares.developer@gmail.com

about.i_am: I’m Enderson Linhares, a front-end web developer and designer based in Fortaleza, Brasil
about.perfecting_skill: I've been since I was 13 years old I have been perfecting my programming skills
about.focus: My focus is on creating engaging, accessible & performant interfaces for humans.
about.programming_paragraph: Since I was 13 years old I have been perfecting my programming skills. My experience as a programmer allows me to find smart solutions to technical challenges while designing elegant and visually appealing websites.
about.design_paragraph: While not your typical designer, I have excellent visual skills and this makes me an excellent presenter. With my strong conceptualization skills, I am able to visualize and create beautiful work. I always liked the visual part, whenever I can I adjust style sheets and create UI's.
about.lang_I_know: Languages and Technologies that I know

projectsContent.1: A project about a fictitious coffee shop, which was developed as a final challenge for the closing of the RocketSeat session
projectsContent.2: Dictionary application made in React that consumes an API
projectsContent.4: An application for converting amounts in dollars to reais, the project is a web challenge for a front-end vacancy offered by Stone Payments
projectsContent.5: Tic Tac Toe Mini Game using styled-components
projectsContent.6: Feed that simulates a social network, project developed to learn the principles of React
